title: didn't receive any xp after bot match
body: I just finished a bot game on TT and didn't receive any xp except for my daily bonus. I only got the 575 xp from my daily bonus but nothing else. Anyone know why this is the case?

replies.body: Heya, was this the match with Vi?  It looks like you were marked as afk in this game so you woudn't receive XP for the end of the match.  It's interesting, though, because you did still receive your First Win of the Day mission for it because your team won.  I'm not sure if that's intended, but I hope that clears things up.
